definition: in order to/for the purpose of/so as to
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
unofficial variant of 瞭[liao4]
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
(of eyes) bright/clear-sighted/to understand clearly

sentences.english: Rather he'll say, "It's for the child's own good.
sentences.chinese: 而是说，“这都是为了孩子好。

sentences.english: They started out early so that they would not miss the train.
sentences.chinese: 他们早早出发是为了不误火车。

sentences.english: So in the interest of helping out the next generation of thieves, I'm going to offer you a few pointers.
sentences.chinese: 所以，为了有助于下一代游荡者们，我准备教你几招。

sentences.english: Should one renounce Nirvana oneself, in order to help others towards it first?
sentences.chinese: 人应该放弃自己的涅磐，为了首先帮助它人达到它？

sentences.english: It is better to weed out the bad businesses within the group rather than cross-subsidise them to save face.
sentences.chinese: 将集团内的不良业务剔除，好过为了面子予以挽救。

sentences.english: Drache to confidential action content, therefore has not to clarify in this matter.
sentences.chinese: 卓凯为了保密行动内容，故一直没有就此事作出澄清。

sentences.english: Walking home by the alma mater is just for seeking fun.
sentences.chinese: 经过母校步行回家仅仅为了取乐而已。

sentences.english: The slit scanning is required to obtain two-dimensional spectral imaging.
sentences.chinese: 为了得到像斑的二维光谱，需要做狭缝扫描。

sentences.english: You think I'm just withholding information because I like hanging out with you?
sentences.chinese: 你以为我会知情不报只为了和你聊天？

sentences.english: Because ofu, I know the distance is just a number for us!
sentences.chinese: 答应你，我会为了你在西雅图好好照顾自己。

sentences.english: In order to make strong shot, a player must be able to hold racket very hard.
sentences.chinese: 为了击球有力，选手必须将拍子抓得非常紧。

sentences.english: To de fend our country we must strengthen ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 为了保卫祖国，我们必须自强不息。

sentences.english: To get that figure, look at the figures before seasonal adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 为了得到这个数字，我们先来看下季节调动的情况。

sentences.english: To simulate the Force, technicians hid devices on "Kenobi's" person.
sentences.chinese: 为了模拟原力，技术人员在“克诺比”身上藏了仪器。

sentences.english: I find the best way to do this is to scrape them with an X-acto knife.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得最好的方法这样做是为了刮他们的X雅刀。

sentences.english: One must wash his hands before meals to avoid diseases.
sentences.chinese: 为了避免病从口入，饭前要洗手。

definition: purpose/aim/goal/target/objective/CL:個|个[ge4]
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
because/owing to/on account of
therefore/as a result/so/the reason why
see 的士[di1 shi4]
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
aim/clear
really and truly
original intention
for this reason/with regards to this/in this respect/in order to do this/to this end
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
unofficial variant of 瞭[liao4]
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
(of eyes) bright/clear-sighted/to understand clearly
merely/simply/only/but
with this/thereby/thus/because of this
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
to want to/to feel like/to fancy/to care for sb/desirous of
thus/consequently/as a result
surname Ye
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
old variant of 和[he2]/harmonious
surname He/Japanese (food, clothes etc)
old variant of 和[he2]
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
